name: 科技行銷管理
description: 本課程為科技行銷管理之基礎課程，旨在協助主修科技管理之研究所學生了解現代行銷理論、概念與實務，課程將聚焦於科技行銷理論、市場分析方法之介紹以及個案討論，並透過課程與專題培養學生市場區隔、訂定目標市場、定位、以及科技產品與服務定義產品、定價、通路管理以及行銷公關之能力。
goals: 協助學生瞭解並應用科技行銷理論
syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction

Week 2: Marketing Management Fundamentals (1)

Week 3: Marketing Management Fundamentals (2)

Week 4: Introduction to the World of High-Technology Marketing

Week 5: Strategic Market Planning in High-Tech Firms

Week 6: Culture and Climate Considerations fm High Tech Firms

Week 7: Market Orientation and Cross-Functional (Marketing-R&D) Interaction

Week 8: Partnerships, Alliances, and Customer Relationships

Week 9: Marketing Research in High-Tech Markets

Week 10: Understanding High Tech Customers

Week 11: Technology and Product Management

Week 12: Distribution Channels and Supply Chain Management in High-Tech Markets

Week 13: Pricing Considerations in High-Tech Markets

Week 14: Marketing Communication Tools for High-Tech Markets

Week 15: Strategic Considerations in Marketing Communications

Week 16: Strategic Considerations for the Triple Bottom line in High-Tech Companies

Week 17: Final Project Presentation (1)

Week 18: Final Project Presentation (2)
